title: Eject Symbol

verbs: To remove, to stop providing (one's support, etc).
Remove something concrete, as by lifting, pushing, or taking off, or remove something abstract
To move something from one place to another, especially to take away.
To remove something or someone from their current location.
To remove something and put it in a different place.
To remove an association or connection.

description: An eject symbol, displayed as an upward-pointing triangle above a horiztonal bar. May be used as a physical button or an icon in a user interface. Represents the action of ejecting physical media such as a floppy disk, videocasette or DVD on a computer or media player.
apple_vendor_description: The eject button emoji on Apple devices presents a clean, minimalist design, featuring a prominent triangular arrow pointing upwards from a horizontal bar, all rendered with a crisp, metallic sheen. Apple‚Äôs precise lighting and subtle beveling give it a tactile, almost physical presence, suggesting action and removal. Its straightforward visual language on Apple devices makes it ideal for indicating the desire to eject media or to exit a process.
